title: Ex-Chicago cop Jason Van Dyke released from prison for murder of Laquan McDonald — to a deafening call for hi… - Chicago Sun-Times
content:
1. Ex-Chicago cop Jason Van Dyke released from prison for murder of Laquan McDonald — to a deafening call for hi…  Chicago Sun-Times
  2. 16 shots and an early release: Former officer Jason Van Dyke, who killed Laquan McDonald, leaves prison  CNN
  3. As Van Dyke is freed from prison, keep focus on police reform  Chicago Sun-Times
  4. Attorney Ron Safer Discusses Release of Jason Van Dyke  WGN News
  5. Column: Joe McMahon opens up about Jason Van Dyke's release from prison, Richard Irvin's run for governor and his own future plans  Chicago Tribune
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ex-Chicago Police Officer Jason Van Dyke was released from custody Thursday morning after serving more than three years in prison for the 2014 murder of Laquan McDonald.
